text:
I tried to access the function signature of a method using the `extractSig()` function here <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/46321515/get-function-signatures>.
Could anyone explain why
```Tuple{typeof(function),Integer,Integer,Integer}```
the first type parameter here is the `typeof` the function?

attachments.title: Get function signatures
attachments.text: Is there a way to get a function's signatures at run time? I'd like to check the signature before calling that function. Something like: exp = @sig func if "kw" âˆˆ string(exp) func(kw=value) end

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
